Reviews.Author: LaMaisonGrise
Reviews.Content: i’ve stayed half dozen hotels paris keeper love location busy vibrant neighborhood café’s nicer corner metro lines crossing fast city access markets twice week tourists – typical expensive parisian hotels – nicely decorated ie none horrendous wallpaper lower hotels breakfast onto pleasant interior garden breakfast temperate weather interior recommended garden airshaft staff varies professional friendly recommended local cafés le bouquet de grenelle le suffren le mottepicquet dinner walk eiffel tower watch lights congratulate yourself didn’t cruise theme park paris

Reviews.Title: “A treasure in Paris”
Reviews.Author: EvidencebyFran
Reviews.Content: hotel kilometre walk eiffel tower metro station street hotel surrounded patisseries shops restaurants quiet night suited didnt spend time staff exceptionally friendly helpful reserve flights online print tickets security buzz staff door key kept reception dont worry losing lift dont stairs breakfast little expensive dont plenty options street outside definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Hotel de l'Avre is a cute nice Parisian hotel. It made my first visit in Paris perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Veve547
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 days xmas 2012 chosen based recommendation travel guide decision located near metro station le motte picquet grenelle brasseries convenient stores clean stayed 1st floor facing street window staff helpful speaks english landed paris 530am arrived hotel 7am forgot check waiting awhile staff happy provide temporary shower change clothes ps cute garden backyard makes hotel european style nice breakfast shiny days hotel experience makes trip paris perfect

Reviews.Title: “A little over priced for what you get.”
